Package dev.orphoros.demo.amalgamlib.controllers

Class ReviewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.orphoros.demo.amalgamlib.controllers.ReviewController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/reviews")
@CrossOrigin(origins="*",
             allowedHeaders="*")
public class ReviewController
extends java.lang.Object
    Review controller

    This class is responsible for handling GET, PUT, POST and DELETE requests.

    The review controller is being mapped under the /reviews path. The controller can only work with Json objects

    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Orphoros
    See Also:
    Review, ReviewService, ReviewRepository

    • Method Detail

      • getReviewByID

        @GetMapping("{id}")
public Review getReviewByID​(@PathVariable
                            java.lang.Long id)
        GET Mapping for Review using review ID and ISBN

        Allows to retrieve from the central database a review by its ID.

        Implementation Note:
        A review may be accessed by calling /reviews/012345 where the number in the path is the ID of the review to retrieve
        Parameters:
        id - path variable ID of the review to retrieve
        Returns:
        Review by its corresponding ID

      • getAllReviews

        @GetMapping
public java.util.List<Review> getAllReviews​(@RequestParam
                                            java.lang.Long isbn,
                                            @RequestParam(required=false)
                                            java.lang.Integer stars,
                                            @RequestParam(required=false)
                                            java.lang.String nickname)
        GET Mapping for Review

        Allows to retrieve a list of books based on request parameters. The ISBN request parameter is mandatory as a different books' reviews cannot be mixed together.

        Parameters:
        isbn - Mandatory request parameter to filter reviews by corresponding book ISBN
        stars - Optional request parameter to filter by stars given as a rating
        nickname - Optional request parameter to filter by reviewer's nickname containing a keyword
        Returns:
        List of found reviews for a book based on the request parameters

      • addNewReview

        @PostMapping
@ResponseStatus(CREATED)
public Review addNewReview​(@RequestBody
                           Review r)
        POST Mapping for Reviews

        Allows to add a new Review to the database using Json.

        Implementation Note:
        A new review may be provided in the request body of the POST request in Json format under the path /reviews.
        Parameters:
        r - Review to add to the database in Json format from the request body
        Returns:
        Review copy of the newly saved review if succeeded

      • deleteReview

        @DeleteMapping("{id}")
@ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT)
public void deleteReview​(@PathVariable
                         java.lang.Long id)
        DELETE Mapping for Review

        Allows to delete an existing review using its ID

        Implementation Note:
        A review may be deleter under /reviews/012345 where the number in the path is the ID of the review to delete
        Parameters:
        id - path variable ID of the review to delete

      • updateReview

        @PutMapping("{id}")
public Review updateReview​(@PathVariable
                           java.lang.Long id,
                           @RequestBody
                           Review r)
        PUT Mapping for Review

        Allows to update an existing review's details using its corresponding ID

        Implementation Note:
        A review may be updated under the path /books/012345 where the number in the path is the ID of the review to update. A request body containing the same ID must be present as well!
        Parameters:
        id - path variable ID of the existing review to update
        r - Json formatted review in the request body with the updated details containing the review ID
        Returns:
        Review copy of the saved and updated review if succeeded
